plugin.name: scale-title-filter
plugin._long: Filter the views shown by scale by typing.

option.name: case_sensitive
option._long: Match titles in a case sensitive way.

option.name: share_filter
option._long: Whether the active filter is shared among all outputs. Set to false to filter independently on each output.

option.name: overlay
option._long: Whether the current filter value is shown as an overlay.

option.name: font_size
option._long: Size of the text used in the overlay.
